entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Stephenville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:31 AM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -5.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Stephenville Airport 06:30 AM NST Monday 20 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -5.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -8.9°C
Wind: ENE 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning this morning then changing to rain this afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming south 50 gusting to 70 except gusting to 100 along parts of the coast late this afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 16 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain at times heavy. Temperature rising to 6 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy changing to showers overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 10 to 20 mm except 40 mm in areas of heaviest rain. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 100 along parts of the coast this evening. Wind becoming south 30 gusting to 50 near midnight then southwest 20 gusting to 40. Temperature rising to 6 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 20 February 2023
